name: cclient
description: A Minecraft client that interfaces through ComputerCraft turtles.

scripts.build: tsc -p src/server/tsconfig.json && tstl -p src/turtle/tsconfig.json && npm run prepend
scripts.prepend: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const fp = './dist.lua'; const d = fs.readFileSync(fp); fs.writeFileSync(fp, 'local Arguments = {...}\n' + d);"
